comment: Lectures were extremely boring, and he'd often take the entire hour and a half class to INCORRECTLY solve a single problem. There are only 2, 5 question tests (excluding final), which would feature at least one question not covered in lecture (usually doesn't curve). If you get stuck with him, just look up Jeff Hanson or FinalAnswer on YouTube.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Test heavy
